install.name: eshop_flatitem
install.title: Flat Item Shipping
install.author: Giang Dinh Truong
install.description: This is Flat Item Shipping method for Eshop

field.name: min_total
field.label: Min Total
field.description: If the total amount reach Min Total, then the Flat Item Shipping will be disable and the Free Shipping will be available. Leave 0 if you do not want to use it.

field.name: min_quantity
field.label: Min Quantity
field.description: If the quantity amount reach Min Quantity, then the Flat Item Shipping will be disable and the Free Shipping will be available. Leave 0 if you do not want to use it.

field.name: rates
field.label: Rates
field.description: You can set up multiple rates for multiple geozones, each rate per a row with format: geozone_id_1|cost_1...

field.name: show_shipping_cost_with_tax
field.label: Show Shipping Cost With Tax
field.description: If Yes, once you choose a Tax Class below, it will display shipping cost include tax.

field.name: payment_methods
field.label: Payment Methods
field.description: Choose corresponding available payment methods when Flat Item Shipping method is chosen. Select all or Un-select all to choose all payment methods.

field.name: customer_groups
field.label: Customer Groups
field.description: Choose the customer groups to apply flat item shipping.
